text: @MattHancock Your not qualified to make these decisions!!  You’re just showing us all how stupid you are!! Bringing Horse Racing back or any other sporting event is just throwing the public to the wolves (COVID19)!  Are the NHS ready for the 2nd wave because it’s coming!! You’re a FOOL!!!
